title: Netra Bhandari
text:
I am a PhD student in the Environmental Informatics lab at Univeristy of Marburg. I am currently working in two projects, Kilimanjaro Socio-Ecological Systems and RIPA2TAN. I deal mainly with spatio-temporal data analysis.
